description: Jasper Johns chose numbers as subjects because they are "conventional, depersonalized, factual"—freeing him from any obligation to construct a visual narrative. With Figure 4 he played with the number's meaning, winking at the tradition of “figural” painting and evoking the homophone "for" in the title to create an unfinished sentence. Meanwhile the monumental "4" of the painting itself is almost lost among the lively brushstrokes.
title: Figure 4
